data.name: V: Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
I Kicked A Cloud Once, JHAS, and Omari Jazz have produced wonderful tracks that we felt were quite fitting for V.

We'd like to give back to them by creating this Soundtrack DLC - purchasing this DLC you're support both the developers and the artists.

TRACKS:

01 V - Oceania (Omari Jazz - One 4 Galactus)
02 V - Asia (I Kicked A Cloud Once - Aura)
03 V - Europe (I Kicked A Cloud Once - GRANT REMIX)
04 V - The Americas (JHAS - Talking, Sleeping, Waving, Waiting)
05 V - Africa (I Kicked A Cloud Once - SATURN PART 2)
06 V - Space (I Kicked A Cloud Once - R00)

Some of the tracks listed are edited versions of the originals that were made for the game.
DISCLAIMER: DOES NOT CONTAIN DLC TRACKS

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher
  • Processor: 1.80GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X v10.7 Lion or higher
  • Processor: 1.80GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
